title: Bulletin
title-note: Montana Bureau of Mines and Geology
additional-notes: Some issues of this serial have distinctive titles.  Before concluding that such an issue is in the public domain, search for book renewals under its distinctive title. We have not systematically searched individual issue titles.
Spot-checks of online issues from the 1960s and 1970s open on HathiTrust did not turn up copyright notices.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Iren Sokolova for copyright research on this title.
